```{r}
library(readr)
library(MASS)
games = read_csv('2019-2020_ANNO_games_details.csv')
starters = read_csv('2019-2020_ANNO_games_details_STARTER.csv')
benches = read_csv('2019-2020_ANNO_games_details_BENCH.csv')
games = subset(games, select = -c(COMMENT))
games = na.omit(games)
games$WIN = as.factor(games$WIN)
```
```{r}
attach(games)
library(dplyr)
set.seed(1)
team = games %>% group_by(TEAM_ABBREVIATION)
```
```{r}
models = games %>% 
  group_by(TEAM_ABBREVIATION) %>%
  do(model = glm(WIN~START_POSITION, data=., family = binomial(logit)))
models$model
```
